meanings.definition: The condition of having multiple faces or sides.
meanings.sent1: The toy had many polyhedroses, making it interesting to look at.
meanings.sent2: I learned about polyhedroses in geometry class.
meanings.sent3: The artist's sculpture had an amusing number of polyhedroses, making it a unique piece.
meanings.sent4: Her personality had many polyhedroses, each side revealing a different aspect of her character.
meanings.sent5: The crystal had intricate polyhedroses that sparkled in the sunlight.

meanings.sent1: In the box, there were various polyhedroses of different shapes and sizes.
meanings.sent2: The teacher asked us to identify the polyhedroses in the diagram.
meanings.sent3: The shop sold colorful polyhedroses, each representing a different mathematical concept.
meanings.sent4: The city skyline was a collection of polyhedroses, each building standing tall and proud.
meanings.sent5: The garden was filled with polyhedroses, creating a mesmerizing display of shapes.
